enrichments.label: Enhance Company Info
enrichments.description: Enriches company data with additional info.

inputFields.name: Domain
inputFields.label: Select domain identifier
inputFields.description: The company domain or website URL is the most effective identifier for company data enhancement.

outputFields.name: Industry
outputFields.description: The industry or sector the company operates in

outputFields.name: Founded Year
outputFields.description: The year the company was founded

enrichments.label: Enhance Person Info
enrichments.description: Enriches person data with additional professional information.

inputFields.name: Person's Full Name
inputFields.label: Person's full name
inputFields.description: The person's full name is required for accurate data enrichment.

inputFields.name: Company Domain
inputFields.label: Company domain identifier
inputFields.description: The company domain helps identify the person's workplace and improves search accuracy.

inputFields.name: LinkedIn URL
inputFields.label: LinkedIn profile URL
inputFields.description: Optional LinkedIn profile URL for direct data extraction. If not provided, will search for profile information.

outputFields.name: Job Title
outputFields.description: Current job title or position at the company

outputFields.name: Company
outputFields.description: Current company or organization where the person works

outputFields.name: Location
outputFields.description: Current location (city, state, country) where the person is based

enrichments.label: Enhance Email Info
enrichments.description: Enriches email data with additional information and confidence score.

inputFields.name: Domain
inputFields.label: Company domain identifier
inputFields.description: The company domain is required to identify the organization and improve email accuracy.

inputFields.name: Full Name
inputFields.label: Person's full name
inputFields.description: The person's full name is required to generate accurate email addresses.

outputFields.name: Email Address
outputFields.description: The most likely professional email address for the person
